price: (21) Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
